title: Verify All Team Subscriber
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is an all team subscriber
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects media for playback
custom_expected: THEN the media player starts playing

title: Verify Exec User
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is an exec user
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects media for playback
custom_expected: THEN the media player begins playing the video from the live point

title: Verify Audio Only Users Select Video
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is an audio only user
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a video feed to play
custom_expected:
THEN the best audio feed is selected for playback
AND the media begins playback

title: Verify Audio Only User Selects Audio
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is an audio only user
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects an audio feed to play

title: Verify Favorite Home Media Selection
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user with a favorite team is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a game with that favorite team as a the home team to watch
custom_expected: THEN the home feed is selected for playback

title: Verify Single Team Media Selection
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled single team user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a game including the subscribed to single team
custom_expected: THEN the single team’s feed is selected

title: Verify Audio Only  User Media Selection
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled audio only user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks a video feed for the game
custom_expected: THEN the audio feed is selected

title: Verify Un-entitled User Media Selection
custom_preconds: GIVEN an un-entitled user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a game where they are un-entitled to all media feeds
custom_expected: THEN the user receives the “un-entitled” error message

title: Verify No Favorite Team Selection
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user with no favorite team is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a game to watch
custom_expected: THEN the home team’s feed is selected for playback

title: Verify Favorite Team Away Media Selection
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user with a favorite team is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a game with that favorite team as a the away team to watch
custom_expected: THEN the away feed is selected for playback
